title: Eastward Flow - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Cross-dressing   Politics   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reversible Couple   Second Chance   Transmigration
author: Jiang Yi Shui   江一水
description:
Zhongli Shuo knew that her Empress was the only one in the world who could give her the same support that she herself gave. She respected her and understood her, but the one thing she didn't dare do was let the Empress know that she loved her. 

After awakening once more from a blazing inferno, then meeting once more - could they be together, still?

Zitong…>
